feed.title: forms4health documentation
feed.subtitle: forms4health help documentation and knowledge base.

entry.title: Improvements to forms4health documentation
entry.content:
Welcome to the new look forms4health user guide and knowledge base mini-site. This site is still very new and there are undoubtedley gaps and additional things we can improve upon.

What do we hope the site will achieve?

We aim to provide a complete knowledge base on this site that will be a useful resource whether you are new to developing forms with forms4health or are quite experienced developing forms - here the site can act as a full reference guide and ensure you are getting the most out of the platform.

Feedback is welcome

As this site is always going to be a continual work in progress we would welcome feedback and/or notificaiton of typos etc that will go a long way to improving the documentation quality and utility of the site. If you have suggestions please use the contact form on the site and/or email us at support@airelogic.com.
entry.summary: Welcome to the new look forms4health user guide and knowledge base mini-site. This site is still very new and there are undoubtedley gaps and additional things we can improve upon.
